quest.name: Unfortunate Fortune-telling
journal:
 Quest Sync
Learningway is worried one of his fellow Loporrits has met with misfortune.
objectives: Investigate the water reserve in Greatest Endsvale.
Fill the empty bottle with allegedly purifying water.
Pour the allegedly purifying water on the shaky Loporrit.

dialogue.name: LEARNINGWAY
dialogue.text: If you're not too busy, might I trouble you to look into something for me?

dialogue.name: LEARNINGWAY
dialogue.text: I recently heard word that one of our fellows is acting strangely near one of the water reserves in Greatest Endsvale.

dialogue.name: LEARNINGWAY
dialogue.text: Everyone knows that water is for our passengers-to-be, and if anything should happen to those reserves, it could ruin everything!

dialogue.name: LEARNINGWAY
dialogue.text: I doubt they would talk to me, but I suspect they might be willing to confess their plans if you asked them. You'll help, won't you?

dialogue.name: LEARNINGWAY
dialogue.text: The reserve you're looking for is on the northern end of Greatest Endsvale. Please hurry before they do anything foolish.

dialogue.name: LEARNINGWAY
dialogue.text: I can't imagine what they would want with that water, but we can't risk anything happening to that reserve.

dialogue.name: FLUTTERINGLOPORRIT04248
dialogue.text: Wah! Who are you? What's the matter?

dialogue.name: FLUTTERINGLOPORRIT04248
dialogue.text: Suspicious? Me? But why? I haven't done anything wrong.

dialogue.name: FLUTTERINGLOPORRIT04248
dialogue.text: Urianger was teaching me about telling fortunes, and I've been trying to practice so I could show the others how it's done.

dialogue.name: FLUTTERINGLOPORRIT04248
dialogue.text: In fact, I even made my own carrot cards, though they're not quite as fancy as Urianger's. I tried using them to see what good fortune will come to the people of Etheirys when they visit the moon, but...

dialogue.name: FLUTTERINGLOPORRIT04248
dialogue.text: Maybe I did it wrong, but the cards had nothing good to say. I got the complete opposite. So I thought I'd try again after purifying myself in the water here.

dialogue.name: FLUTTERINGLOPORRIT04248
dialogue.text: That is what your people do, yes? I read that it's possible to purify oneself using water, but I don't feel as if anything has changed. Maybe I've missed a step somewhere...

dialogue.name: FLUTTERINGLOPORRIT04248
dialogue.text: Oh! Could you draw the water for me? Coming from Hydaelyn's chosen, I'm sure it'd be the most purifyingest water ever!

dialogue.name: FLUTTERINGLOPORRIT04248
dialogue.text: All you have to do is fill this empty bottle with water and pour it on me. Please─the outcome of my carrot card reading is in your hands!

dialogue.name: FLUTTERINGLOPORRIT04248
dialogue.text: I know good fortune is in the cards for the people of Etheirys. I just need a little help proving it.

dialogue.name: FLUTTERINGLOPORRIT04248
dialogue.text: Ah, how refreshing. I feel like a brand-new Loporrit!

dialogue.name: FLUTTERINGLOPORRIT04248
dialogue.text: Already I can feel my spirit overflowing with good fortune. Time to have another look at those carrot cards, and see what awaits the people of Etheirys.

dialogue.name: LEARNINGWAY
dialogue.text: Well? Did you find out what that good-for-nothing was up to?

dialogue.name: LEARNINGWAY
dialogue.text: Oh! Really? Well, that's...actually quite admirable, making such efforts to understand the culture of Etheirys.

dialogue.name: LEARNINGWAY
dialogue.text: That said, I'm not sure one is meant to redraw cards until they find a desired result. Or perhaps I misheard how fortune telling is meant to work...

dialogue.name: LEARNINGWAY
dialogue.text: ...Maybe I should go and talk to them about that.

dialogue.name: LEARNINGWAY
dialogue.text: Then again, there's been no harm done, and they mean well. Perhaps I'll discuss the finer points of card reading with them another day. Thank you for looking into this!
